variants.desc:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum created by the Stellaron, it parasitize upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor burns with the blazing flames in the core of stars.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.desc: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Blazing Absorption
skills.desc: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Molten Fusion
skills.desc: Gains ATK. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

variants.name: Blaze Out of Space (Bug)
variants.desc:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The original reference entity is an alien life form that was born out of the Fragmentum brought by a Stellaron and feeds on this world's energy. Its armor carries the flames taken from the core of a star.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space (Bug) will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.desc: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Bomb en Masse
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG to all targets and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle to all targets. The more Enkindle absorbed, the more DMG this attack will deal.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Blazing Absorption
skills.desc: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Bomb Warning
skills.desc: Starts charging, and absorbs all the Enkindle statuses that are inflicted on all targets.
